arts.sum: Millenic Alli's 10th-minute goal proved enough to earn Luton all three points in their titanic relegation six-pointer against Derby on Good Friday. Matt Bloomfield's side are finding rhythm at the rig...

arts.ttl: John Eustace confirms 'big' Derby County injury blow as star man ruled out of survival battle
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Speaking after the game, head coach John Eustace said: "Unfortunately, he's fractured his eye socket, so he's going to be out for the season.

arts.ttl: Bloomfield lauds Town's fighting spirit as Luton battle to a first win at Derby since 1990
arts.sum: Hatters earn crucial 1-0 success at Pride Park

arts.ttl: Matt Bloomfield reveals Luton Town tactic that condemned Derby County to damaging defeat
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. â€œWe spoke during the week about having the momentum and not letting last week's result against Blackburn ruin what we've been building, and I thought we came out of the traps today and were excellent.

arts.ttl: Alli on target as Luton grind out an absolutely priceless Rams victory
Nathaniel Mendez-Laing taken to hospital after suffering Derby County injury blow
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Derby County winger Nathaniel Mendez-Laing has gone to hospital after suffering a suspected fractured eye socket.

arts.ttl: Derby County sent brutal message as battling Luton Town stage smash and grab
arts.sum: Ahead of the rest of today's Good Friday games, Derby remain outside the bottom three, but now only on goal difference as Luton's victory sees them join the Rams on 43 points, just one ahead of Cardiff and three clear of Plymouth. Derby County played Luton Town at Pride Park this afternoon in a game crucial to both sides' hopes of avoiding relegation from the Championship.

arts.ttl: Derby County face 'massive pressure' as Widell Zetterstrom and Mendez-Laing adds to problems
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Get the latest Derby County news sent straight to your phone

arts.ttl: John Eustace makes frank Derby County admission after Luton Town win crunch relegation battle
arts.sum: John Eustace admitted his Derby County side "looked a bit anxious" in the first half as Luton Town secured victory over their relegation rivals at Pride Park. "In the first half we just looked a little bit nervous, it was a big game and Luton made it very difficult for us.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Luton Town as several struggle in defeat to relegation rivals - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Derby didn't look comfortable in dealing with crosses into the box and after Nathaniel Mendez-Laing went off injured, Lamine Fanne stroked a shot into the side netting. Kane Wilson: Digged out a great cross just before half-time in what was a rare attack in a first-half that largely passed Derby by.
